metadata.title: CVE-2020-22402 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SOGo Web Mail before 4.3.1 allows attackers to obtain user sensitive information when a user reads an email containing malicious code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sogo - 4.3.2-1
sogo-activesync - 4.3.2-1
sogo-common - 4.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sogo package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1').
